name: Intro
_source: speak;Reimu;And I thought it couldn't get any colder.
speak;Marisa;Worse off, looks like more of those weird guys are blocking the way.
speak;Kasen;Strange. They just always seem to get the jump on us.
speak;Reimu;They aren't letting up either. What a pain!
speak;Mima;Hmm, maybe I can make it less of a pain.
speak;Reimu;Huh? What are you getting at?
speak;Mima;I would think you'd be more observant, given your profession.|Look over there!
speak;Lyrica;Ah, looks like the road is blocked.
speak;Lunasa;How are we even supposed to reach the venue now?
speak;Merlin;Hmm, maybe we're supposed to pay a toll?
speak;Lyrica;And where are we even supposed to get the money for that?|We are strapped for cash as is.
speak;Lunasa;It has been a while since our last concert...|This was supposed to be our next big break too.
speak;Lyrica;I'm still not sure about this either. Raiko is on break, remember?
speak;Merlin;We've went without drums plenty of times~|We can totally do it again!
speak;Lunasa;Yes, Merlin, but the question is, how do we even get in?
speak;Merlin;Ah, I thought it would work this time.
speak;Lyrica;I thought we already went over this.
speak;Mima;Which is exactly what we need!
speak;Kasen;So you mean to recruit them. How can we trust you?
speak;Mima;Going on about that again? I supppose actions speak louder than words.
speak;Marisa;C'mon, give her a chance, will ya'?
speak;Reimu;*Sigh* If you mess this up, I swear-
speak;;This map's clear bonus is 1000 Bonus EXP, with a decrease of 200 BExp per turn you take over 18 turns!;;;hint
